Name: The First Sight?
Desc: To confront the formidable enemy is to confront the fears of the past.

Name: Deadlock
Desc: Words are redundant now. Regardless of the doom that awaits us, there has only been one thing we can do.

Name: Echo
Desc: Our battles, our stories... they are bound to echo through the land.

Name: Assemble
Desc: We settle every score, old and new, here and now!

Name: The Ending?
Desc: This may cost her dearly, but a civilization like this deserves a future worth hoping for.
